skills.react: I often use next technologies: React-Redux for state managing, React-Router-Dom for work with routs, Redux-Form and Formik, Redux-Thunk for side-effects.
skills.ts: I like statically typed languages because there is so much more time left to code than fix bugs.
skills.sass: I use sumantic HTML tags, for cross-browser compatibility I use normalize.css and check the browser support for the tags used (Hello IE!...) And I really like working with animation.
skills.gsap: I like greensock (GSAP) library for animation. Today I make easy animation, but I want improve the skill in future.
skills.rest: For HTTP requests (CRUD operations) I like Axios library and now I study Socket.io for work with web-sockets.

mavik.title: Mavik Pro Landing
mavik.text_1: What tools were used: HTML / SASS, JavaScript, Slick-slider, GSAP for animation, PHPMailer.
mavik.text_2: This is a landing page with a small animation on the greensock (GSAP) library.

ca.title: ChipAssist marketplace
ca.text_1: What tools were used: React / Redux, React-router-dom, Material ui, Styled component, I18next, React Hook Form, Axios, Stripe
ca.text_2: This is a marketplace - a commercial project of electronic components, team development.
